languages.text: "Жри, железный святой! Жри, да не подавись тонкими благородными косточками!" {n}В ответ на выкрик скомороха толпа взрывается злорадным хохотом.{/n}
"Eat your fill, iron saint! Gorge on the thin noble bones, and try not to choke!" {n}At the fool's screech, the crowd erupts in malicious laughter.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Жри, железный святой! Жри, да не подавись тонкими благородными косточками!" {n}В ответ на выкрик скомороха толпа взрывается злорадным хохотом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eat your fill, iron saint! Gorge on the thin noble bones, and try not to choke!" {n}In response to the jester's screech, the crowd erupts in a malicious laughter.{/n}

languages.text: “饱餐一顿吧，铁家伙！好好享受这个贵族又脆又软的骨头，可别噎到了！”{n}小丑放声大叫起来，人群爆发出了充满恶意的笑声。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Eat your fill, iron saint! Gorge on the thin noble bones, and try not to choke!" {n}At the fool's screech, the crowd erupts in malicious laughter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “饱餐一顿吧，铁家伙！好好享受这个贵族又脆又软的骨头，可别噎到了！”{n}小丑放声大叫起来，人群爆发出了充满恶意的笑声。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Come hasta reventar, santo de hierro! ¡Deléitate con los finos huesos del noble, y procura no atragantarte!». {n}La multitud prorrumpe en maliciosas carcajadas al oír las exhortaciones del bufón.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Eat your fill, iron saint! Gorge on the thin noble bones, and try not to choke!" {n}At the fool's screech, the crowd erupts in malicious laughter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Come hasta reventar, santo de hierro! ¡Deléitate con los finos huesos del noble, y procura no atragantarte!». {n}La multitud prorrumpe en maliciosas carcajadas al oír las exhortaciones del bufón.{/n}

languages.text: "Doyasıya ye demir azizim! İnce soylu kemiklerini tıka basa ye, boğulmamaya çalış!" {n}Soytarının çığlığı üzerine kalabalık, kötücül kahkahalara boğuluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Eat your fill, iron saint! Gorge on the thin noble bones, and try not to choke!" {n}At the fool's screech, the crowd erupts in malicious laughter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Doyasıya ye demir azizim! İnce soylu kemiklerini tıka basa ye, boğulmamaya çalış!" {n}Soytarının çığlığı üzerine kalabalık, kötücül kahkahalara boğuluyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「鉄の聖者よ、その腹を満たし給え！貴族の細い骨をガツガツ食べて、喉を詰まらせないように！」{n}道化の金切り声で、群衆は悪意に満ちた笑いを起こす。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Eat your fill, iron saint! Gorge on the thin noble bones, and try not to choke!" {n}At the fool's screech, the crowd erupts in malicious laughter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「鉄の聖者よ、その腹を満たし給え！貴族の細い骨をガツガツ食べて、喉を詰まらせないように！」{n}道化の金切り声で、群衆は悪意に満ちた笑いを起こす。{/n}

languages.text: « Régale-toi, saint de fer ! Repais-toi des os fragiles de ce noble, et tâche de ne pas t'étouffer ! » {n}Les hurlements stridents du bouffon provoquent l'hilarité malveillante de la foule.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Eat your fill, iron saint! Gorge on the thin noble bones, and try not to choke!" {n}At the fool's screech, the crowd erupts in malicious laughter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Régale-toi, saint de fer ! Repais-toi des os fragiles de ce noble, et tâche de ne pas t'étouffer ! » {n}Les hurlements stridents du bouffon provoquent l'hilarité malveillante de la foule.{/n}

languages.text: "Esst Euch satt, eiserner Heiliger! Verschlingt die dünnen adeligen Knochen und erstickt nicht daran!" {n}Das Kreische des Narren lässt die Menge in boshaftes Gelächter ausbrechen.{/n}
